resources.string: Which age band do you fit into?

Thinking about your work experience overseas, in the last 10 years, how long have you worked in your nominated occupation or closely related skilled occupation (note that if you have a skilled date in your skill assessment, work experience prior to this would not count for points):
How would you rate your English language ability?

Have you met the requirements for the award of degree, diploma, advanced diploma or trade qualification(s) which took at least 2 years of full-time study in Australia at an Australian institution, which are relevant to your nominated occupation and which were taught in English?

Thinking about your work experience in Australia, in the last 10 years, how long have you worked in your nominated occupation or closely related skilled occupation (note that if you have a skilled date in your skilled assessment, work experience prior to this would not count for points):
Do you want to apply alone or with your partner.
Do any of the following apply to you?
Choose your related work profile category from the given below to know if P.R. options are available.
I am accredited as para-professinal interpreter or translator (level 2) by the National Accreditation Authority for Translators and Interpreters

Passport: from UK, USA, Ireland, Canada or NZ; or
IELTS: 6+ in each component; or
PTE Academic: 50+ in each component; or
Cambridge(CAE): 169+ in each component; or
TOEFL iBT: 12 in Listerning 13 Reading, 21 Writing, 18

IELTS: 7+ in each component; or
OET: B pass in each component; or
PTE Academic: 65+ in each component; or
Cambridge(CAE): 185+ in each component; or
TOEFL iBT: 24 in Listerning, 24 Reading, 27 Writing, 23

IELTS: 8+ in each component; or
OET: A pass in each component; or
PTE Academic: 79+ in each component; or
Cambridge(CAE): 200+ in each component; or
TOEFL iBT: 28 in Listerning, 29 Reading, 30 Writing, 26 Speaking
Study in Regional Australia or a Low Population Growth Area

Have you
- Met the requirement for the award of degree, diploma, advanced diploma or trade Step2QualificationActivity(s); AND
- The Step2QualificationActivity(s) were not in English language proficiency; AND
- The Step2QualificationActivity(s) took at least 2 years of full-time study in Asutralia; AND
- The Step2QualificationActivity(s) were taught in English; AND
- The campus of your institution is in a regional or low population growth area;
- You have spent at least 2 years living in the regional or low population growth area;
- You did not complete the Step2QualificationActivity(s) via distance education?
Have you\n- Have you complete a Professional Year in Australia in your occupation following your studies - currently available for accountant, engineers and IT professionals:
Do you have STEM/IC(Master/phd degree from australia.)
My partner has competent English ability
My partner can pass skill assessment in an Occupation List for my subclass.
